      Approves of CEO

      I have been working at ConocoPhillips full-time

      Pros

      CP is an amazing place to work. Great people. The company is working towards being more innovative. Good benefits.

      Cons

      It is an oil company, so still moves at a slow pace.

      Advice to Management

      Keep promoting younger managers--get the baby boomers out.

      ConocoPhillips 2019-01-14 18:18 PST

    Interviewing at ConocoPhillips

    1. Dec 3, 2010

      Helpful (7)  

      Agent Interview

      Anonymous Employee in Anchorage, AK
      Accepted Offer
      Positive Experience
      Average Interview

      Application

      The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at ConocoPhillips (Anchorage, AK) in March 2008.

      Interview

      The interview process took about 6-7 weeks including an onsite interview in Anchorage. The process was positive. Goals and needs were clearly laid out and relevant colleagues and managers were actively involved. This was what I would call the site-test following two in depth phone interviews which included several areas concerning past work history and relevant experience.

      Interview Questions

      • I really do not remember at this point. They were all pretty average behavioral or work specific questions.   1 Answer
      ConocoPhillips 2010-12-03 11:00 PST
    See All 282 Interviews
